title: [Large-Scale] Program to Enhance Mathematics Learning Effectiveness Through Self-Directed Online Learning Environment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational math concepts and ability to use online learning tools
context.additional_context: Customized mathematics content for current professionals, emphasizing job relevance.

learning_goals: Within four weeks, learners establish a self-directed learning plan in a VR-based environment and achieve an execution rate of over 80%.
Learners solve complex mathematical problems with over 90% accuracy in three consecutive simulation tasks.
Learners improve their self-directed learning ability metric by over 20% in an online learning effectiveness survey.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
